data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 462 believers in Saint Thomas Lowland, Saint Kitts and Nevis a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Thomas Lowland, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Saint Thomas Lowland to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Saint Thomas Lowland to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Saint Thomas Lowland.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cotton Ground
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cotton Ground, Saint Thomas Lowland, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Saint Thomas Lowland.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Saint Thomas Lowland with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.focus_label: Saint Thomas Lowland, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Saint Thomas Lowland, Saint Kitts and Nevis humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Saint Thomas Lowland
location.full_name: Saint Thomas Lowland, Saint Kitts and Nevis
